text: Today, I signed an executive order and released the MI Safe Schools Roadmap to provide a structure to support schools in Michigan as they plan for a return of K-12 education this fall. The executive order and the MI Safe Schools Roadmap are available at https://t.co/m2sOFDoo30. https://t.co/l43XXB11nV
